name: home-assistant
tagline: A local-first home automation platform for controlling smart devices
description: Home Assistant is a popular open source home automation platform that runs locally and integrates with thousands of smart devices and online services. It provides dashboards, automations, voice control and a powerful extensible ecosystem.

features.title: Local Deployment
